pkgmetadata.longdescription: One-Sided Multivariate Testing Procedures for Rating Systems // An implementation of statistical tests for the validation of rating systems as described in the ECB Working paper ''Advances in multivariate back-testing for credit risk underestimation'', by F. Coppens, M. Mayer, L. Millischer, F. Resch, S. Sauer, K. Schulze (ECB WP series, forthcoming).
